highlights: Homes with pre-installed fittings and senior-friendly design features
Access to services like 24 hour emergency response and other optional paid care services
Apply via the HDB Flat Portal

description: An initiative focusing on preventive healthcare to help residents stay healthy, detect health issues early and manage them well.
highlights: One-time free first Health Plan consultation with your chosen clinic
Free nationally-recommended screenings & vaccinations for Singapore Citizens only
Subsidies on selected chronic medications under Healthier SG Chronic Tier from 2024

title_en: ABSD Concession for Single Singapore Citizen Seniors
description: Provides single Singapore Citizen seniors (aged 55 and above) a refund for the Additional Buyer's Stamp Duty (ABSD) on their second residential property purchase.
highlights: Refunds ABSD for eligible seniors who have purchased their second property
howToApply: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"bulletList","content":[{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Apply for the ABSD refund online through the "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://mytax.iras.gov.sg/estamping/","target":"_blank","rel":"noopener noreferrer nofollow","class":null}}],"text":"e-Stamping Portal"},{"type":"text","text":" with these steps:"}]},{"type":"bulletList","content":[{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Select \"Request\" then \"Apply for Assessment / Appeal\""}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Select \"Assessment (including remission and penalty)\""}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"If the document is stamped, select \"Yes\" and enter the Document Ref No., then click “Continue” to fill in the rest of the details and submit the form"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"If the document has not been stamped, please stamp it and pay the ABSD before applying for the ABSD Concession"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"To stamp the document, select “Stamping” > “Sale & Purchase – Purchase/Acquisition” then select the relevant form (e.g. For purchase of residential property, select the “Sale and Purchase Agreement” or “Acceptance to Option to Purchase” document description and fill in the details)"}]}]}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"At the “Supporting Documents” page, under “Additional Information”, please key in “ABSD Concession for Single SC Seniors”"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Please also submit both the following supporting documents with your application:"}]},{"type":"bulletList","content":[{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Copy of the exercised Option to Purchase / Sale and Purchase Agreement (if applicable) for the purchase of the second residential property"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Copy of the exercised Option to Purchase / Sale and Purchase Agreement (if applicable) for the sale of the first residential properties"}]}]}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"For successful applicants, the refund will be made to the party liable for payment of stamp duty."}]}]}]}]}
title: ABSD Concession for Single Singapore Citizen Seniors
whatAreBenefits: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Fully refunds the ABSD for eligible seniors on their second residential property purchase."}]}]}
whoIsEligible: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Eligibility for the ABSD refund is subject to the following conditions:"}]},{"type":"bulletList","content":[{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"You must be a single Singapore Citizen senior (aged 55 and above) who purchased a second residential property on or after 16 February 2024"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"You have paid the ABSD on the second property"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Your first residential property is solely owned by you (single Singapore Citizen aged 55 and above) / co-owned by you and your immediate family members^ (all are single Singapore Citizens aged 55 and above)"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"The owners of the first residential property must also be owners of the second"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Any additional owners purchasing the second residential property with the owners of each first residential property must also be single Singapore Citizens aged 55 and above who are immediate family members"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"The buyer(s) can only own up to 1 residential property each when purchasing the second property"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"All buyers must not have purchased or acquired any other residential property since the purchase of the second residential property"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"The first residential property must be sold or disposed of within 6 months of either:"}]},{"type":"bulletList","content":[{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"the date of purchase of the second property (for completed property)"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"the date of issue of the Temporary Occupation Permit / Certificate of Statutory Completion whichever is earlier (for incomplete property)"}]}]}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"No change in ownership of the second property at the time of the first property's sale"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"The value^^ of the second property must be less than each of the first properties that were sold"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"The application for ABSD refund must be made within 6 months after the date of sale of the first property"}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"text":"^ Immediate family members refer to one's parent, child, or sibiling. ^^ The “value” refers to the higher of the property’s purchase price or market value. The second property’s value is calculated as at its date of purchase. The first property is as at its date of sale."}]}]}

description: Seniors aged 55 or above may receive cash bonus when they right-size to a 3-room or smaller HDB flat, and top-up the proceeds from the sale of their existing property into their CPF Retirement Account (RA) and join CPF LIFE.
highlights: Receive CPF monthly payouts for as long as they live, under CPF LIFE
Application must be submitted within 1 year from date of completion of the second housing transaction
howToApply: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"bulletList","content":[{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Learn about your eligibility for this scheme (and other housing monetisation options) and the estimated monthly payouts you can receive via "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://iam.hdb.gov.sg/common/login?spcptracking=1716446712747__8986_fab2969afadd","target":"_blank","rel":"noopener noreferrer nofollow","class":null}}],"text":"HDB’s Enquire Housing Monetisation Options e-Service"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"To apply:"}]},{"type":"bulletList","content":[{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Enquire with our Customer Relations Executive during the appointment for second housing transaction (either resale completion or new flat keys collection appointment)"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"HDB will then schedule a financial counselling session where all the details and information such as the CPF top-up amount, bonus and the monthly payout amount would be shared during the session"}]}]}]}]}]}]}
title: Silver Housing Bonus (SHB)
whatAreBenefits: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"bulletList","content":[{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Supplement your retirement income if you sell your current flat or private housing with an Annual Value not exceeding $21,000 and buy a 3-room or smaller HDB flat"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Receive up to $30,000 cash bonus per household, when you top-up up to $60,000 of your proceeds^ into your CPF Retirement Account (RA)~ and join CPF LIFE"}]},{"type":"bulletList","content":[{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"If the top-up is less than $60,000, the cash bonus will be pro-rated based on a 1:2 ratio (i.e. $1 bonus for every $2 top-up)"}]}]}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"text":"^ Proceeds refer to selling price of the current property minus the sum of any outstanding loan on the current property, the purchase price of the next flat, and resale levy payable."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"text":"~ If your CPF RA balance is already at the prevailing Full Retirement Sum (FRS), you will not be able to join SHB."}]}]}
whoIsEligible: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"bulletList","content":[{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"At least 1 owner must be a Singapore Citizen"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Singapore Citizen owner is aged 55 or above"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Monthly household income not more than $14,000"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Existing property is a HDB flat that fulfils minimum occupation period for resale, or private housing with an Annual Value of $21,000 or less"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"No concurrent ownership of a second property"}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Other conditions:"}]},{"type":"bulletList","content":[{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Next property you are buying is 3-room (excluding 3-room terrace) or smaller flat from HDB or from the resale market"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Purchase price does not exceed selling price of the current/ last sold property"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Booking of new HDB flat or application to buy resale flat must either be before sale of existing property or within 12 months of completing sale of existing property"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"SHB application must be submitted within 1 year from date of completion of the second housing transaction (either the purchase or sale)"}]}]}]}]}

title: Senior Priority Scheme (SPS)

description: The Live Well, Age Well programme is co-organised by HPB and PA to provide holistic activities to improve the physical, mental and social health of adults aged 50 and above.

description: Provide opportunities for residents to pick up new skills and interests through courses offered at Community Centres/Clubs (CCs) and Residents’ Networks (RNs).
highlights: Dive into lifelong learning with PA's array of courses, from technical skills to languages
Enhance your well-being with health and wellness tips, including grooming, makeup, skincare, and body care advice
Embrace your interests and passions with lifestyle and leisure courses, exploring arts, crafts, cooking, and creativity
Keep fit with our wide range of sports and dance fitness courses

title: OnePA CC Courses
whatAreBenefits: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"bulletList","content":[{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Diverse range of courses at Community Centres/Clubs (CCs) and Residents’ Networks (RNs) covering everything from personal growth to interest development in areas like enrichment, health, hobbies, and fitness"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Industry Guru Series: Tailored networking and deep dive learning opportunities to prepare you for the evolving job market"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"SkillsFuture@PA: Enhance your skills and knowledge by utilising your SkillsFuture Credit (SFC) for courses at CCs"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"PA SHIOK Series: Customised courses and programmes by the People’s Association (PA) Malay Activity Executive Committees Council (MESRA) and Malay Muslim Organizations (MMOs)"}]}]}]}]}

description: Provides seniors with a steady stream of retirement income when they sell the tail-end of their flat lease to HDB while they continue to occupy the flat for the lease they retained.
highlights: Receive monthly payouts and continue to stay in the flat for the lease retained when you sell the tail-end lease of your flat to HDB
Application takes about 3 months to complete from the date of interest to proceed
Make an e-appointment with HDB for a preliminary financial counselling session
howToApply: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"bulletList","content":[{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Learn about your eligibility for this scheme (and other housing monetisation options) and the estimated monthly payouts you can receive via "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://go.gov.sg/hdb-hmoptions","target":"_blank","rel":"noopener noreferrer nofollow","class":null}}],"text":"HDB’s Enquire Housing Monetisation Options e-Service"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"To apply:"}]},{"type":"bulletList","content":[{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Make an "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://services2.hdb.gov.sg/webapp/BF13AWAppointmentWeb/branch/","target":"_blank","rel":"noopener noreferrer nofollow","class":"tiptap-a"}}],"text":"e-appointment"},{"type":"text","text":" with the HDB Branch"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Log in with or without Singpass"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Click on 'Make a new appointment'"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Select 'Lease Buyback Scheme'"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Then 'Enquiry'"}]}]}]}]}]}]}
title: Lease Buyback
whatAreBenefits: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"bulletList","content":[{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Sell part of your flat's lease to HDB and choose to retain the length of lease based on the age of the youngest owner"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Proceeds from selling part of your flat's lease will be used to top up your CPF Retirement Account (RA), and you can use your CPF RA to join CPF LIFE, which will provide you with a monthly income for life"}]}]}]}]}
whoIsEligible: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"bulletList","content":[{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"At least 1 owner must be a Singapore Citizen"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"All owners 65 years and older"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Monthly household income not more than $14,000"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"No concurrent ownership of second property, and no more than 1 non-residential private property"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"All owners have been living in the flat for at least 5 years, or 10 years for Plus or Prime flats"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Flat has at least 20 years of lease to sell to HDB"}]}]}]}]}

description: CPF Lifelong Income For the Elderly (CPF LIFE) is a national longevity insurance annuity scheme that provides you with monthly payouts no matter how long you live.
highlights: Monthly payouts for life
Offers various plans to suit individual preferences and needs
Option to start payouts at a later age to receive up to a 7% increase in monthly payout
howToApply: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"bulletList","content":[{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"CPF Board will send you a notification three months before your 65th birthday to explain your options and guide you in choosing your CPF LIFE plan"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"If you have not instructed the CPF Board regarding your payouts by then, your payouts will automatically start when you turn 70 under the LIFE Standard Plan"}]}]}]}]}
phoneNumber: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"CPF Hotline: "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"tel:1800-227-1188","target":"_blank","rel":"noopener noreferrer nofollow","class":null}}],"text":"1800-227-1188"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"To avoid waiting on the line, you may book an appointment "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.cpf.gov.sg/appt/oas/form","target":"_blank","rel":"noopener noreferrer nofollow","class":"tiptap-a"}}],"text":"here"},{"type":"text","text":"."}]}]}
title: CPF LIFE
whatAreBenefits: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"bulletList","content":[{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Provides a lifelong monthly payout to protect against outliving one’s savings"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Unlike private annuity plans, which are subject to investment market returns, CPF LIFE monies are guaranteed by the government and earn a risk-free interest of up to 6% per annum"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Offers various plans to suit individual preferences and needs:"}]}]}]},{"type":"table","content":[{"type":"tableRow","content":[{"type":"tableCell","attrs":{"colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Escalating Plan"}]}]},{"type":"tableCell","attrs":{"colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Increasing monthly payouts to help you maintain your lifestyle when prices increase."}]}]}]},{"type":"tableRow","content":[{"type":"tableCell","attrs":{"colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Standard Plan"}]}]},{"type":"tableCell","attrs":{"colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Steady monthly payouts even if you may have to keep within a fixed budget and adjust your lifestyle when prices increase."}]}]}]},{"type":"tableRow","content":[{"type":"tableCell","attrs":{"colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Basic Plan"}]}]},{"type":"tableCell","attrs":{"colspan":1,"rowspan":1,"colwidth":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Payouts that will get progressively lower when balances fall below $60,000. You may have to lower your lifestyle further when prices increase."}]}]}]}]},{"type":"bulletList","content":[{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Option to start payouts at a later age to receive up to a 7% increase in monthly payout."}]}]}]}]}
whoIsEligible: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"bulletList","content":[{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"You can choose to join CPF LIFE as long as you are a Singapore Citizen or Permanent Resident, at any time from 65 to one month before you reach 80"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"For Singapore Citizens or Permanent Residents born in 1958 and after, with at least $60,000 in the Retirement Account when you start receiving your monthly payouts, will be automatically included in CPF LIFE"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"You can be exempted from CPF LIFE if you have a pension or commercial annuity that pays the same or higher monthly payout as CPF LIFE"}]}]}]}]}

description: Provides CPF members an option to invest their OA and SA savings to enhance retirement funds.
highlights: Grants multiple options to invest your Ordinary Account (OA) and Special Account (SA) savings

description: Helps eligible senior Singapore Citizens with lower retirement savings to save more by matching cash top-ups made to their Retirement Accounts (RA). This will boost their monthly payouts in retirement.
highlights: Dollar-for-dollar matching grant on cash top-ups to your RA of up to $600 (this will increase to $2,000 from 1 January 2025) per year
Boost CPF retirement savings and monthly payouts
Earn CPF interest rates of up to 6% per annum on cash top-up

title: Matched Retirement Savings Scheme
whatAreBenefits: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"bulletList","content":[{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"The Government will match every dollar of cash top-ups made to the RA of eligible seniors of up to $600 per year"},{"type":"hardBreak"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"From 1 January 2025, the matching grant cap will be increased to $2,000 per year, with a $20,000 cap over an eligible member’s lifetime"},{"type":"hardBreak"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"The matching grant will automatically be credited to the RA of the eligible member at the beginning of the following year"},{"type":"hardBreak"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Eligible seniors will enjoy "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.cpf.gov.sg/member/growing-your-savings/earning-higher-returns/earning-attractive-interest","target":"_blank","rel":"noopener noreferrer nofollow","class":null}}],"text":"interest rates of up to 6% per annum"},{"type":"text","text":" on the cash top-up and matching grant, enhancing their retirement payouts"},{"type":"hardBreak"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"If you make a cash top-up to yourself and your loved ones, you can enjoy tax relief of up to $16,000 per calendar year"},{"type":"hardBreak"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Find out more on the "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.cpf.gov.sg/service/article/what-are-the-conditions-for-me-to-enjoy-tax-relief","target":"_blank","rel":"noopener noreferrer nofollow","class":"tiptap-a"}}],"text":"conditions to qualify for tax relief"}]}]}]}]}

description: Provides a quarterly cash supplement to give eligible seniors greater assurance in retirement.
highlights: Quarterly cash payments of up to $900 currently and up to $1,080 from 2025
Seniors living in smaller flats or with lower household income will get higher payouts
No application needed

description: Boost your own or loved ones’ retirement savings and payouts through voluntary cash top-ups or CPF transfer to your own or loved ones' Special Account (SA) or Retirement Account (RA).

description: Supports eligible individuals in their tax payments through various payment arrangements such as longer GIRO-based instalment plans.
